Repeat: purl wrapping yarn twice around needle for each stitch

sl 4 wyib, dropping extra wraps to form 4 long stitches; slip the same 4 stitches back to the left-hand needle; insert point of right-hand needle purlwise into 3rd and 4th stitches and lift these stitches together over the first 2 stitches, placing them nearest the point of the left-hand needle in position to be knitted first, then knit all 4 stitches
